committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on SBA Legislation and the General Economy

official_title: To clarify the eligibility of certain small businesses for loans under the Small Business Act, to aid, protect, and preserve small businesses in meat production and marketing, and for other purposes.
short_title: Small Business Meat Producer and Marketer Protection Act of 1993

summary.text: Small Business Meat Producer and Marketer Protection Act of 1993 - Amends the Small Business Act to change the loan eligibility requirements for certain small businesses. Defines "meatpacker or meat marketer engaged in commerce." Imposes limits on the slaughter, sale, purchase, and forward delivery of certain livestock by meatpackers or meat marketers engaged in commerce. Establishes fines for violations of this Act.

titles.title: Small Business Meat Producer and Marketer Protection Act of 1993
To clarify the eligibility of certain small businesses for loans under the Small Business Act, to aid, protect, and preserve small businesses in meat production and marketing, and for other purposes.
